top.title: Bondi gunmen 'meticulously' planned attack for months, police allege
top.summary: Police release a tranche of documents allegedly tracing the suspects' movements prior to the deadly shooting.

top.title: Russian general killed by car bomb in Moscow, officials say
top.summary: Fanil Sarvarov was the head of the armed forces' operational training department, Russia's Investigative Committee said.

top.title: US lawmakers threaten legal action against Attorney General over Epstein files
top.summary: A Republican and a Democrat who have led calls for transparency accuse the justice department of failing to meet legal obligations.

top.title: Will the US TikTok deal make it safer but less relevant?
top.summary: The key to the app's success - its algorithm - is to be retrained on US data. Will that make US TikTok blander?

top.title: TikTok owner signs deal to avoid US ban
top.summary: The deals would end years of efforts by Washington to force ByteDance to sell its US operations.

top.title: UK to ban deepfake AI 'nudification' apps
top.summary: A new offence looks to build on existing rules outlawing sexually explicit deepfakes and intimate image abuse.
